Latest Freegal music downloads

Written by Leon Paternoster · Published May 20, 2014

Freegal is our free, legal MP3 downloading and streaming service. You’ll just need your library card number and PIN to use it.

Here’s our pick of the best newly available downloads:

Rock

  • Greatest hits by Foo Fighters
  • Mechanical bull by Kings of Leon

Pop

  • Can’t rely on you by Paloma Faith
  • Crying for no reason by Katy B

Easy listening

  • Ultimate Manilow by Barry Manilow
  • Songs from the last century by George Michael

Dance

  • Best of Frankie Knuckles by Frankie Knuckles
  • UKF Bass Culture 2 by Various artists

R&B

  • Timber by Pitbull feat. Ke$ha
  • My own lane by Kid Ink

Classical

  • Stravinsky/Brahms: Violin concertos LP by Hilary Hahn

More music
